TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program on Sale at Green Man Gaming

Articles.Content:
Hi, everyone.

In case any of you are in need of a copy of KSP for yourself, friends, strangers, pets or anyone else in the universe, direct them to the sale that is currently underway at Green Man Gaming.

You get 33% off the regular price, then use code GMG25-0YUM5-VKMVU for an extra 25% off! It's a a nice low price for a whole lot of game.
